description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $378.1K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with L BREAU AND SONS. The average
  contract duration was 0.45 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $422.4K.
  The longest contract was 1.73 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $3.9M.
